word: H7069 - קָנָה - qânâh - kaw-naw' - Attain - சென்றடை

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - எரிச்சல், உண்டாக்கு, பெறு, வாங்கு, ஈட்டுதல், கொள், சம்பாதி, கைக்கொள், வாங்கிக்கொள், உடையவர், அடை, வாங்கினவன், கொள்ளுகிறவன், எஜமான், கொண்டவன்
to get, to acquire, to create, to buy, to possess
1) to get, to acquire, to obtain
a) used of Godoriginating, creating, redeeming His people; a Possessor
c) used of acquiring knowledge, wisdom

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to erect, that is, create; by extension to procure, especially by purchase (causatively sell); by implication to own: - attain, buy (-er), teach to keep cattle, get, provoke to jealousy, possess (-or), purchase, recover, redeem, X surely, X verily.
Cognate: H4735, H4736, H4737, H7069, H7075
